item.description: Problem set 001 # Buttons are styled links that can lead to local page or external link. Exercise 01 # Exercise 02 # Implement a color mapping application that helps people who are color blind see the colors around them. Exercise 04 # Exercise 03 Exercise 03 # Research other color models such as HSL, HSB, XYZ. Exercise 06 Exercise 06 # Research & implement some dither visual apps. Exercise 08 # Implement a pixelator video application and perform a benchmark of the results (color avg vs spatial coherence).

Buttons # Buttons are styled links that can lead to local page or external link. Example # {{< button relref="/" [class="..."] >}}Get Home{{< /button >}} {{< button href="https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book" >}}Contribute{{< /button >}} Get Home Contribute
